sentences.sContent: By changing the tomato’s genetic blueprint , scientists can alter the rate at which it ripens.
sentences.sCn: 科学家可以通过改变番茄的基因蓝图来改变它的成熟速度。

sentences.sContent: ...being aware of your self-expectation with a clear future blueprint lays a foundation for this important decision...
...Chinese Academy of Sciences released a series of annual reports about its latest scientific findings and a blueprint for the coming year...
